name: Conatix Europe UG
memberOrga: We are a company and do not have member organizations.
goal: A software company (startup) applying advanced AI technology to help companies, banks and government agencies work with massive volumes of unstructured data (text, image, voice, video) for business research and knowledge management, and for cybersecurity.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Competition, Employment and Social Affairs, Enterprise, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Information Society, Research and Technology
euInitiatives: Polices relating to innovation, particularly in software and related AI technology, and policies related to technology startups, investment and fostering a European startup ecosystem.
